title: Thousands of Unvaccinated New York City School Employees Placed on Unpaid Leave
sub_head: As vaccine mandate takes effect, 95% of all employees show proof of at least one dose; 1,800 school safety agents don’t
body:
Thousands of New York City school staff were barred from returning to work Monday for failing to comply with a vaccination mandate that took effect Friday afternoon.
About 95% of the 150,000 employees at the city’s Department of Education have been vaccinated, including 96% of teachers and 99% of principals, Mayor Bill de Blasio said Monday.
